permanentHotkey.name: Create permanent Waypoint
permanentHotkey.description: Creates a permanent Waypoint that will never get deleted automatically.

serverHotkey.name: Create temporary Waypoint
serverHotkey.description: Creates a Waypoint that gets deleted once you disconnect from the server.

alwaysShowWaypoints.name: Waypoints Always Visible
alwaysShowWaypoints.description: Waypoints will be visible, even if they are far away.

remove.title: Do you really want to remove this waypoint?

overview.temporary: This waypoint will be deleted once you disconnect from this server.
